summary: Signe, spared from death to produce a child, befriends a little girl, Frigg, and escapes from the camp.
cast: Isabel Christine Andreasen|Ingrid Bolsø Berdal|Milla Olin|Tobias Santelmann|Bjørn Moan|Gaahl|Martin Slaatto|Richard Skog|Hans Jacob Sand|Hallvard Holmen|Iren Reppen|Eirik Holden Rotheim|Clara Lien Sunde
title: Escape
